item.title: Some Notes about HHSuite
item.description: Table of Contents Summary HMMs HHSuite Database Programs Usage What is HMM-HMM comparison and why is it so powerful? When can the HHsuite be useful for me? How can I verify if a database match is homologous? Should I use the -global option to build MSAs Why do I get different results using hhblits and hhsearch The following summary is mainly from the HHsuite official user guide.
